actions.name: createRecord
actions.description: Creates a new record into a specified table.

actions.name: deleteRecord
actions.description: Deletes a record from a table.

actions.name: downloadFileFromRecord
actions.description: Downloads a file attached to a record.

actions.name: listFilesFromRecord
actions.description: List files attached to a specific record (without downloading) for management.

actions.name: updateRecord
actions.description: Updates fields on an existing record.

actions.name: uploadFile
actions.description: Attach a file to a record.

triggers.name: newRecord
triggers.description: Triggers when a new record is created in a table.
